column4: hi running an .rm file with totem-xine the pc hangs and i get kernel panic message when i look at dmesg? any ideas?
dmesg gives you a kernel panic? or just shows you one?
the pc hangs and the last thing i see on the screen is the kernel panic message
any information from the kernel panic?
let me check it out now. it was just a code with bunch of numbers
oh, that won't help
won't help me, anyway
I get that sometimes playing movies over the network if I try to seek too fast
the file is on my home dir
and it just ran fine now with realplayer. only had this error consist with totem-xine
do you have an ati card and running fglrx?
not on the box that was giving me the trouble, but on the box I'm on now I do
i suspect it might be the problem here. Thanx for you help though my firend
I wouldn't expect so, if realplayer plays it without trouble
if you have win32codecs totem would just be using realplayer's codecs
what might it be then. ps trying dmesg now i have no message regarding the kernel message problem
actually... DO you have w32codecs installed?
yap
if so, can mplayer play the file?
totem start to play the file. then all of a sudden a black screen and the kernel panic message. Then the pc hangs
right, but if you play it with mplayer...
let me check
plays though little bit crappy but plays
